supportingMedia.value:
To be exposed to this issue the following configuration needs to be present:

[security ike gateway <gateway-name> tcp-encap-profile <profile-name> ]

configuration.value:
To be exposed to this issue the following configuration needs to be present:

  [security ike gateway <gateway-name> tcp-encap-profile <profile-name> ]

supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

supportingMedia.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS 20.4R3-S8, 21.2R3-S6, 21.3R3-S5, 21.4R3-S5, 22.1R3-S3, 22.2R3-S3, 22.3R3-S1, 22.4R2-S2, 22.4R3, 23.2R1, and all subsequent releases.

solution.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS 20.4R3-S8, 21.2R3-S6, 21.3R3-S5, 21.4R3-S5, 22.1R3-S3, 22.2R3-S3, 22.3R3-S1, 22.4R2-S2, 22.4R3, 23.2R1, and all subsequent releases.

supportingMedia.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.

work_around.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.

descriptions.value: Una vulnerabilidad Double Free en el flow processing daemon (flowd) de Juniper Networks Junos OS en la serie SRX permite que un atacante no autenticado basado en red provoque una denegación de servicio (DoS). En un escenario de VPN de acceso remoto, si se configura un "tcp-encap-profile" y se recibe una secuencia de paquetes específicos, se observará una falla fluida y un reinicio. Este problema afecta a Juniper Networks Junos OS en la serie SRX: * Todas las versiones anteriores a 20.4R3-S8; * Versiones 21.2 anteriores a 21.2R3-S6; * Versiones 21.3 anteriores a 21.3R3-S5; * Versiones 21.4 anteriores a 21.4R3-S5; * Versiones 22.1 anteriores a 22.1R3-S3; * Versiones 22.2 anteriores a 22.2R3-S3; * Versiones 22.3 anteriores a 22.3R3-S1; * Versiones 22.4 anteriores a 22.4R2-S2, 22.4R3.
